idc_detailnote: You may change these options from the game's "Preferences" window later, if you wish.
idc_detailprompt: Based on your computer's speed, memory, and video card, the Unreal Engine has selected the following detail options in order to optimize performance.

idc_prompt: The Unreal Engine is starting up for the first time.  If you experience any problems, please read the release notes in the "Programs / Unreal Tournament" section of the Windows "Start" menu.

idc_safemode: Run Unreal Engine in safe mode - for troubleshooting
idc_safemodeprompt: The previous time the Unreal Engine was run, it was not shut down properly.  In case the shut down was caused by a problem, you may use the options below for recovery.
idc_safemodeprompt2: Unreal Engine safe mode options: If you are experiencing problems, you may use the options below for recovery.
idc_web: Visit our Web site for troubleshooting tips

idc_resetconfig: Reset all configuration options to defaults
idc_safeoptions: Safe mode options, for diagnosing problems
